EmailTemplate.name: Push to Attorney Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: You have a new suggested case assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name},
{!Case.00N4100000cw3M3} has assigned a case to you in the JusticeServer Portal. Please review the case to confirm there are no conflicts and that you are willing to take the {!Case.00N4100000cw3MJ}
